title: Tech subsidies shift SRAS right, decrease PL

content.question: In the long run, government subsidies that promote the development of technology with widespread business applications will have which of the following effects?

choices.label: A negative supply shock and lower price level
A negative supply shock and lower economic growth rate
A positive supply shock and lower price level
A positive supply shock and lower economic growth rate
A lower aggregate demand and lower price level

content.answer: A positive supply shock and lower price level

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
